name: Destruct To Win
description:
Game made for the GameDev.TV 2022 gamejam with the theme "Death is Beginning". This game follows on that Theme by Introducing mechanics which involve self-destruction of player robot which will be remade a certain number of time and the older dead robots will be used as platforms to help solve the puzzle.

Eveything was made in a time-limit of 7 days so this game may contain bugs.
